CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Account_Referral__c )), HYPERLINK( $Label.Server_URL&"lightning/r/Account/"&Account_Referral__c&"/view", Account_Referral__r.Name ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Lead_Referral__c )), HYPERLINK( $Label.Server_URL&"lightning/r/Lead/"&Lead_Referral__c &"/view", Lead_Referral__r.Company ), ""))
CustomField.label: Referral By
